intro: Rhodax hieronymi, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and clusters of showy, violet-colored flowers. The plant belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is well adapted to humid, shaded environments. It is a popular houseplant due to its attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements. Rhodax hieronymi thrives in well-draining soil and requires indirect sunlight to flourish.
